name: Border-Radius Scale
description: Border-radius tokens encode shape semantics — different radii for different component types. Hardcoded border-radius values should use tokens instead.

scale.label: Control
scale.purpose: Form inputs, buttons, small interactive controls

scale.label: Pill
scale.purpose: Pill-shaped elements — tags, badges, fully rounded buttons

scale.label: Circle
scale.purpose: Circular elements — avatars, round icons, radio buttons

rule: Border-radius should use scale tokens rather than arbitrary pixel values. The scale ensures visual consistency across components.
